name: Ambler Neve Beanie - Women's
description: Keep your head cozy and warm with this retro toque. Topped with an oversized pom, the Neve Beanie brings a little fun to icy weather.Soft fleece headband.Handmade in Nepal, as part of Ambler's Himalayan Collection, which helps more women in Nepal learn a skilled trade and create a livelihood that supports and empowers women in the developing world.One size fits all.
